subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=麴|こうじ|hhira=かうぢ}}

# ''[[koji]]'': a [[mold]], ''[[Aspergillus oryzae]]'', [[used]] as a [[starter]] for [[rice]], [[barley]], [[soybeans]], etc. to make ''[[sake]]'', ''[[miso]]'', etc.
